task.summary: Add Chamilo developers guide in Spanish (largely outdated and incomplete, just serves as a basis)
Update README links to all languages
Update main admin README to point to the right start of English Admin guide
Remove partial files and unite in README for French admin guide introduction
Edit links in French admin guide introduction
Review text of Spanish Admin guide
Finished first refresh of dev guide for 1.11
